Smart Hanger: A coat hanger with a built-in charging station for your devices. It can hold up to 4 smartphones or tablets and has a USB port for charging. The hanger also has a built-in LED light for illuminating your closet or dresser.
Personalized Coat Hanger: A coat hanger with customizable hooks that can be personalized with your name or initials. It also has a built-in mirror and a hook for hanging bags or accessories.
Air-Dry Coat Hanger: A coat hanger with a built-in air-drying function for delicate garments. It has a special ventilation system that circulates air to dry your clothes faster and prevent wrinkles.

Smart Coat Hanger with Weather Forecast: A coat hanger with a built-in weather forecast display. It can detect your location and display the current weather conditions and forecast for the next few days.

Vibration-Activated Coat Hanger: A coat hanger that vibrates when it detects that you are approaching. It can be set to vibrate at a specific time each day to remind you to hang up your coat or activated manually by pressing a button on the hanger.
